title: Guitar 5.0
intro: Music plays a profound role in our cultural identity. I am creating a gallery installation about our collective musical experience as Americans. I am mechanizing 50 acoustic guitars, one for each of the United States.
description:
Music plays a profound role in our cultural identity. I am creating a gallery installation about our collective musical experience as Americans. I am mechanizing 50 acoustic guitars, one for each of the United States. The guitars will be of all different ages, types, and origins, creating a diversity of tone as unique as we are. Each instrument will be tuned to a different chord inspired by our musical grandparents: Blues and Country. The guitar automatons will be strummed in unison, creating an immersive sound collage. Now, I need YOU to help make this idea come to life!

The America I adore is deeply polarized to the point of violent interaction.  I want to make a piece that taps into our national ethos: Country and Blues, the two most American musical art forms. We all have a favorite song. When we love a song, it has the power to stimulate the full spectrum of feelings and memories. This power is also capable of building empathy and transcending political discord. I want to create a piece that dissects, affirms and perhaps makes us question our own personal myths of what it means to be an American.

"

title: Giant Speed
intro: It tracks and displays your cycling metrics without having to push a single button, syncing with the fitness apps you already use.
description: Designed by cyclists, for cyclists; SmartHalo 2 is the all-in-one connected device that breathes life into your bike. It helps you discover new routes with clear navigation signals. It protects your bike with an ear-piercing anti-theft alarm. It lights your way with a completely redesigned, all-powerful front light. It tracks and displays your cycling metrics without having to push a single button, syncing with the fitness apps you already use. It keeps you connected to what matters with the brand new, customizable PeekDisplay™. And it looks, feels, and works unlike any bike computer out there.

NATEDE is your brand new incredible Smart and Natural Air Purifier. It will also be the most beautiful design object you will ever have for your home or office, and it's now available for pre-orders.
